info.description: This is a api to app noa gestion
info.title: APP NOA Gestion

post.description: Login user required identifier and password
Parses the request body to create a new expense entry.

delete.description: Deletes an expense based on the provided ID and workplace context.

get.description: Fetches all expenses from the specified tenant.
Fetches all expenses from the specified tenant, on the current day.

put.description: Updates the details of an expense based on the provided data.

post.description: Parses the request body to create a new income entry for either laundry or workshop.

delete.description: Deletes an income entry based on the provided ID and workplace context.

get.description: Fetches all incomes from the specified tenant.
Fetches all incomes from the specified tenant, on the current day.

put.description: Updates the details of an income based on the provided data.

get.description: Fetches income details from based on the provided ID and tenant context.

post.description: This endpoint creates a new movement type based on the provided JSON payload.

delete.description: Deletes a movement type based on its ID.

get.description: Get all movement types from either laundry or workshop based on the provided isIncome query parameter.

put.description: This endpoint updates a movement type based on the provided JSON payload.

get.description: Obtener puntos de ventas asociados a miembro

post.description: Creates a new product in the specified workplace.

parameters.description: Details of the product to create
parameters.name: product

delete.description: Deletes the given product with the given id.

get.description: Fetches products from either laundry or workshop based on the provided name and workplace.

put.description: Updates the given product and returns the updated product.
Updates the stock of a product based on the given method (add, subtract, update).

get.description: Get a product or part by its ID within a specified workplace.

post.description: This function fetches roles based on the user's role and workplace identifier
post.summary: Retrieve roles for a user in a specific workplace

400.description: Bad request if user or workplace is missing

get.description: This function fetches roles based on the user's role and workplace identifier
get.summary: Retrieve roles for a user in a specific workplace

400.description: Bad request if user or workplace is missing

post.description: Creates a new supplier within the specified workplace.

parameters.description: Details of the supplier to create
parameters.name: supplier

delete.description: Deletes a supplier based on the provided ID and workplace context.

get.description: Fetches suppliers from either laundry or workshop based on the provided name and workplace.

put.description: Update a supplier's information from the specified workplace.

get.description: Get a supplier by its ID within a specified workplace.

CookieAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and the JWT token.
CookieAuth.name: access_token
